title: LegendZ - Ultimate Warrior

creator: Mosola Game Studios
descriptionHtml:
Are you searching for a classic action-packed turn-based JRPG with strong heroes where they battle to save the world against incredibly strong warriors in an epic legendary showdown? If so then LegendZ is the perfect anime fighting game for you!
- Plot
Xicor/ Zaiko comes from a war legacy race of warriors that goes around the galaxy destroying planets killing the inhabitants and stealing their energy. Zaiko/ Xicor goes to planet Doro where he is confronted by the first line of defense with Legendary hero Erbito who was trained in the Art of Dragon. And so, the Battle of Doro begins in an epic shadow fight. But Erbito and Kasai (our Heroes) underestimate Xicor/ Zaiko and are almost defeated. Just as Erbito is about to be killed another Legend shows up and challenges Xicor/ Zaiko to a fight.
- Settings
The action takes place on Planet Doro with amazing backgrounds and landscapes. Where the legends defend their planet against the warrior who came to destroy it.
- Characters
LegendZ – dragon showdown has a lot of strong legends to play with and against in a contest of champions. The main warrior of this game is Zaiko and he has a long furious war legacy. And he has the actions skills with amazing transformations and super attacks. All of the Hero LegendZ Zaiko the warrior will battle has their own list of special attacks and stick battle abilities.
- Story Mode
LegendZ is not just an action-packed, action Jrpg fighting game. it has an epic story mode, where you will learn the history of the world and the characters in this stich gogo universe. With more engaging stories to come.
- Versus
Test your intelligence in the tourney/ tournament Versus mode, where you choose which legend you want to fight with and against. Currently there are over +6 Characters choose from each with their own amazing abilities
LegendZ is completely 100% off line, and does not require any internet connection, so you can play anywhere and experience these epic adventures anywhere.
So, to sum up LegendZ fight game, you will be experiencing:
• Fun and challenging Turn based JRPG combat.
• Amazingly brutal animations
• Beautiful arenas.
• Super hard story mode.
• Hardcore fights
• Super war gameplay mechanics
Features:
- Story mode with 8 unique battles.
- 6 Powerful Characters
- beautiful backgrounds
- Amazing Sound Track.

title: LegendZ – Dragon Warrior

creator: Mosola Game Studios
descriptionHtml:
Are you searching for a classic action-packed turn-based JRPG with strong heroes where they battle to save the world against incredibly strong warriors in an epic legendary showdown? If so then LegendZ is the perfect anime fighting game for you!
- Plot
Zaiko Saga:
Xicor/ Zaiko comes from a war legacy race of warriors that goes around the galaxy destroying planets killing the inhabitants and stealing their energy. Zaiko/ Xicor goes to planet Doro where he is confronted by the first line of defense with Legendary hero Erbito who was trained in the Art of the Dragon Warrior. And so, the Battle of Doro begins in an epic shadow fight. But Erbito and Kasai (our Heroes) underestimate Xicor/ Zaiko and are almost defeated. Just as Erbito is about to be killed another Legendary fighter shows up and challenges Xicor/ Zaiko to a fight. And through the power of friendship he defeats Xicor/ Zaiko.

Berserker Saga:
In a powerful battle against Zaiko/ Xicor, Erbito is defeated and his sent to the afterlife. There he is greeted by a demonic Kasai and with the help if his Master, they defeat Demon kasai. But Meroho[Erbito’s master] is unhappy that Erbito died in the previous fight, and so he trains Erbito to unlock a new Transformation.

- Settings
The action takes place on Planet Doro with amazing backgrounds and landscapes. Where the legends defend their planet against the warrior who came to destroy it.
- Characters
LegendZ – dragon showdown has a lot of strong legends to play with and against in a contest of champions. The main warrior of this game is Zaiko and he has a long furious war legacy. And he has the actions skills with amazing transformations and super attacks. All of the Hero LegendZ Zaiko the warrior will battle has their own list of special attacks and stick battle abilities.
- Story Mode
LegendZ is not just an action-packed, action Jrpg fighting game. it has an epic story mode, where you will learn the history of the world and the characters in this stich gogo universe. With more engaging stories to come.
- Versus/ Arcade
Test your intelligence in the tourney/ tournament Versus mode, where you choose which legend you want to fight with and against. Currently there are over +6 Characters choose from each with their own amazing abilities
- Tower Mode
In this mode, each player needs to defeat a specific number of opponents, one after another, or destroy various items. Each opponent that you defeat brings you closer to the top of the tower, up until to the final battle.
LegendZ is completely 100% offline, and does not require any internet connection, so you can play anywhere and experience these epic adventures anywhere.
So, to sum up LegendZ fight game, you will be experiencing:
• Fun and challenging Turn based JRPG combat.
• Amazingly brutal animations
• Beautiful arenas.
• Super hard story mode.
• Hardcore fights
• Super war gameplay mechanics
Features:
- Story mode with +17 unique battles.
- 17 Powerful Characters
- beautiful backgrounds
- Amazing Sound Track.

title: Z Fighters - Anime Turn Based RPG

creator: Mosola Game Studios
descriptionHtml:
Fight with the strongest dragon fighters and Burst to power, SAVE the planet from invaders! With Tactical and strategy, turn-based combat!

🤜 SMITE your enemies with your ultimate skills!!!

🤜 Settings
🐉 The action takes place on Planet Doro with amazing backgrounds and landscapes.

🐉 Superhuman super power is here! Every legendary z warriors have their own Special Attacks!! With each ultimate warrior wielding a unique super power.

🐉 Outsmart your foes using Block and Teleport. With these abilities used tactically, you can evade all of the enemy’s attacks by pressing them at the right time.

🤜 Characters
🐉 The z warriors can use Fusion in this game! Erbito and Thlal combined their power and fused to defeat Xicor, and becomes the ultimate warrior, Erthlato!!! Unfortunately, the fusion didn’t work.
🐉 All the dragon fighters have a different power level. And depending on the power level, it tells you how strong they are.

🤜 Story Mode
🐉 There’s an epic anime story mode and amazing fights, where you will learn the history of the world and the characters in this anime fighter universe.
🐉 With more Super Battles and tiny warriors to come.
🐉 These tiny warriors have so much power that their Energy Blast cause Shocks across the universe!

🤜 Versus
🐉 Currently there are over +17 dragon fighters to choose from, each with their own amazing abilities and ultimate skills.

🤜 Game Modes:
🐉 Story Mode: Play through +18 Amazing Fights. Each with their own unique cutscene.
🐉 Versus Mode: Choose your z warriors and battle it out to see who is the most powerful.
🐉 Arcade Mode: Similar to Versus, only your opponent is the CPU.
🐉 Tower Mode: Classic Tower gameplay, choose your ultimate warrior and fight while climbing the tower.
